Heading: ITS "ON EAR" NOT "OVER THE EAR".
Review:
Product is good, slightly flimsy. Flipkart delivery was on time. But the main issue here is its an "on ear" headset, I personally can't use an on ear as it hurts my ears seriously and also "on ear" can't be used for a long session. But flipkart clearly did a blunder here as its listed as "over the ear". If you are not a fan of on ear stay away, as the padding is not so good and it'll hurt after some time, in my case within 15 to 20 minutes, otherwise if you don't have such problem you can go ...

Heading: Expected a better product

The microphone is not upto the mark, it doesn't cancel out noise. Rather it only captures the noise rather than the voice. Plus it doesn't support LDAC audios.
I would say go for oppo enco m31 if you don't need too much of battery back up.
But one plus has got good specs too. It's build quality is great and this is durable. But what is a good earphone without a good mic???

But flipkart clearly did a blunder here as its listed as "over the ear". 3) Bluetooth transmission will disrupt if you are in different room from source. Even within 6meters.

Heading: Fabulous!
Review:
Pro's:

1. Sound- Loud and clear.
2. Bass - Too good for this price. Best under 1000
3. Call quality and mic - Very good.
4. Build quality - Nylon braided cable.

Cons but not really:

1. Headphone jack with/without gold coating doesn't matter much for normal usage.
2. Headphone jack shape could be better if it would be in L shape. But it mitigates the cable life by providing nylon braided wire. Normal wires with straight headphone jack will worn out soon after regular usage.

Review:
Good quality.

Over all it's a good buy.

Here are some things you need to look before you buy any headphone:
1)Though padding is soft the pressure is more, so it is likely you will feel earlobe pain if used for longer periods.

2) aux cable is way too thin, but works fine. I prefer to listen with aux for better sound quality and less lag while playing games.

3) Bluetooth transmission will disrupt if you are in different room from source. Even within 6meters.

3. You can buy a pair for each day of the week, and you'd still be underpaying.

Bad Stuff:
1. Wire lacks strain relief at earbuds.
2. Single button control
3. Noise isolation isn't great.

Bad Stuff:

2. Single button control
3. Noise isolation isn't great.

Heading: Nice product
Review:
Very good clarity, bass is also very good. I have previously used boat 225, compared to that , product is very light and prefectly fits in ear. Bass is slightly lesser than 225, clarity is very good somewhat better than 225, can hear every beat, microphone is also very good.
Download a decent equalizer and you are all set.
Last but not least ,awesome delivery by flipkart.

Heading: Great product
Review:
it's a decent product from boat, decent bass treble is good .
if you want to buy a earphone that explodes with bass don't go for this one, but if you want clear punch and drums sound..than you should definitely buy this as its bass doesn't blend with treble and ruin the quality...
overall nice product if you'll consider the price also

Heading: Value-for-money
Review:
This earphones are recommended by me
Pros
1. Very good sound quality, bass is well balanced with trible.
2. Light weight.
3. Good wire quality.
4. Mic is good and button is very useful for pause and play next song, also end call.

But flipkart clearly did a blunder here as its listed as "over the ear". *Insta wake and pair feature is great and convenient
*BT range is good to
*Overall for the pricing of 700-800, a great buy, go for it

Heading: Best Budget Earphones Ever!
Review:
Best Budget Earphones Ever! This JBL earphones is excellent, it's pretty affordable, they provide good bass and clear vocals, it has a microphone and a pause button. I'd say this earphones sound is well balanced and clear, comfort wise it's good, they add extra ear tips on the box, so it'll fit perfectly in any type of ear, design is good, it's round. You get a 2-year warranty as well. The wires are 6/10 in durability, will last a year if you're trashing it around on your pocket over and over...

Heading: Great Bass and Worth less than 1K
Review: I just got the earphones 2 days back. A speedy delivery just over the weekend. I started listening to all types of Music. The clarity is good and BASS is just awesome. I have used msot leading earphone products in Seinheiser, Skullcandy, Sony and JBL. It is a good competitor for Seinheiser cx180 and Sony MDX series. mic is an additional advantage. If your budget is less than 1K, please go for this. You will surely love it.

Review:
The overall package for just 749 is rather a good choice for all those earphone enthusiasts out there.
PROS:
1) Best sounding drivers in terms of sound clarity
2) Average bass
3) Super light and comfy on the ears

CONS:
1) Bass could have been a bit more
2) Quality of the wires feels below average

Overall a good deal for the price. Would recommend this to people who care more about the clarity of sound than bass.
Go for it.

Heading: Worth the money
Review:
The treble is high on this one and the bass is lil low but that can be adjusted through an EQ. Apart from that the sound stage is not too wide but I can still feel the groove. Design is nice and build quality feels promising and sturdy.
Final Points to note :
Treble : High (though good for acoustics)
Bass : A bit low (though can be adjusted through EQ)
Design : Looks good
Build quality : Nice and no complaint about that.

Thank you.

Heading: Really Nice
Review:
Good for the price. Fits well, not loose, so doesn't fall out. Audio quality is fairly good, nothing earth-shattering. The bass initially sounds too weak, but if you push the earbuds a bit deeper into the ear, it perks up to what you expect from JBL. Mic quality is fine, quite clear. The multifunction button on the mic assembly is a nice touch, allowing you to pause, restart, skip to next track etc by single/repeated presses.
Overall, a good set of budget earbuds.

Review:
Good quality.

Over all it's a good buy.

Here are some things you need to look before you buy any headphone:
1)Though padding is soft the pressure is more, so it is likely you will feel earlobe pain if used for longer periods.

2) aux cable is way too thin, but works fine. I prefer to listen with aux for better sound quality and less lag while playing games.

3) Bluetooth transmission will disrupt if you are in different room from source. Even within 6meters.

You cant expert a earphone to last for an eternity, how costly you may buy the max it can last is up to a year and a half.
So for this price range if it lasts for 6 or more than 6 months it is more than enough and its good.
Overall 8.5/10

Heading: Worth the money
Review:
Good quality.

Over all it's a good buy.

Here are some things you need to look before you buy any headphone:
1)Though padding is soft the pressure is more, so it is likely you will feel earlobe pain if used for longer periods.

2) aux cable is way too thin, but works fine. I prefer to listen with aux for better sound quality and less lag while playing games.

3) Bluetooth transmission will disrupt if you are in different room from source. Even within 6meters.

Product is good, slightly flimsy. Flipkart delivery was on time. But the main issue here is its an "on ear" headset, I personally can't use an on ear as it hurts my ears seriously and also "on ear" can't be used for a long session. But flipkart clearly did a blunder here as its listed as "over the ear". so, valuable product at under Rs.400 range. Go and buy.

Heading: Mind-blowing purchase

Heading: Wonderful
Review: This is one good headphone with decent sound i will not say that it the most good sounding earphone available, but it is absolutely worth the money you pay. Talking about the built quality it is good for this price, whan it comes to sound quality it has a mild mid and treble and the bass is so smooth. If you are a bass lover it is the one for you, but if you are a good listener of songs better is to look for some other models

Heading: Worth every penny
Review: Very flexible neckband in reasonable price, Mic quality is good for calling with background noise cancellation, battery backup is 15 hours on 60% volume, supports voice assistant, dual pairing mode is awesome, not best for gaming it's just ok for gaming in this price segment, 2 pair of earbud, micro usb cable and a user manual is provided in the box, you can call receive, reject and redial from the power button, no any other neckband competite this at this price segment.

Review: Review after using it for 3 weeks. The design and built quality is good and it looks nice, but the plastic foldable parts feel a bit flimsy and weak. The head band is comfortable and is cushioned. The sound quality is good, with decent bass. The only demerit in this product is that after using it for 30mins or more the ears hurt because the speakers are quite small and the cushion is hard and uncomfortable. Might be uncomfortable for people with big ears. Overall a decent product.
